info.name: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) v.5
info.description: For a wide Screen and the YouTube new Design: Player stay fixed at the LEFT side. - Videos related and in queue on the RIGHT side - Infos, Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their tabs) - Progress Bar is always visible So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments, choose next video without problem. Its Usercript version (GeasyFork): Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer)
info.additionalInfo: For a Wide Screen and the YouTube new Design: Player stay fixed at the LEFT side. - Videos related and in queue on the RIGHT side - Infos, Comment on the RIGHT side ( visible on hover their tabs) So, you can watch the video AND read infos / Comments (by hovering their tabs) without problem. - Progress Bar is always visible Userscripts support for: - Video Speed Buttons - Youtube UI Fix Youtube Play Next Queue: To make it working with Chrome and Tampermonkey, you need add: // @include https://www.youtube.com/* Read: PB with Chrome and Tampermonkey, which need add @include - Youtube - Search While Watching Video - Youtube - dismiss sign-in - YouTube Progressbar Updater Note: After some problem with the use of an agent switcher, which broke this userstyle. For use with Waterfox Classic and User-Agent Switcher by Alexander Schlarb, chose as settings: - Force for the domain (the first one) - Robot: Google Bot Change in v.5: - Support for more YouTube pages (Channels, Playlist, etc... ) - Video Title on top. - Solve a problem around some related video thumbnail not loading. - Add counter for comments really loaded (we should wait their loading before seeing the comments tab too) - Some corrections around player and supported userscripts... - Correction video player: center movie. By example for horizontal center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DsyLuxfu64 and vertical center: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yUif6C_uJgk - Support for no Dark mode. It's a quick support , need more fine tuning, but i use always the Dark mode... Gif Screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/OiHhCS9.gif Infos, Comments Tabs https://i.imgur.com/a3ew4WP.gif It's Userstyle version, here: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer)
